text: evarkal nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceykirarkalo avarkalai niccayamaka allah corkkattil pukuttukiran. Atil niraruvikal totarntu otik kontirukkum. Evarkal nirakarikkirarkalo avarkal, mirukankal tinpataippol tinru kontum, (mirukankalaip pol) cukam anupavittuk kontum irukkirarkal. (Eninum,) avarkal cellumitam narakamtan
